FreePixelGear
art: benmhenry@gmail.com
code: davidahenry@gmail.com

Description:
Nineteen 16 by 16 pixel art lava weapon and armor sprites.<br><br>
Includes: 11 Blades, Axe, Mace, Bow, Helm, Chest, Hands, Legs Feet, Shield.

Documentation:
Files:
FreePixelGear/Gear.png : all sprites on single sprite sheet
FreePixelGear/Gear.unity : example scene
FreePixelGear/ReadMe.txt : this
